    • Connexion

      public Connexion​(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String login, java.lang.String passw) throws java.sql.SQLException, java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
      This constructor connects to the MySQL database at jdbc:mysql://localhost/<name>. It creates an instance of Statement that will be used inside the SearchContainer class.
